results.body: LEAD: Because of an editing error, an article yesterday about the election of Barack Obama as president of the Harvard Law Review misidentified the United States court on which Patricia M. results.body: LEAD: The Harvard Law Review, generally considered the most prestigious in the country, elected the first black president in its 104-year history today. results.title: First Black Elected to Head Harvard's Law Review

results.body: LEAD: Milk Called Uncontaminated The Food and Drug Administration said its most reliable test of milk, in a nationwide survey, had found no residues of potentially harmful antibiotics.
